thm 2wlkdlem1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wceq(cfv(chash, c0), co(cfv(chash, c1), caddc, nat1))
  -| wceq(c0, cs3(c2, c3, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cs2(c5, c6))
} = {
  eqtri(cfv(chash, c0), co(cfv(chash, c1), caddc, nat1), cfv(chash, cs3(c2, c3, c4)))
  fveq2i(chash, c0, cs3(c2, c3, c4))
  eqtri(cfv(chash, cs3(c2, c3, c4)), co(cfv(chash, c1), caddc, nat1), co(nat2, caddc, nat1))
  eqtri(cfv(chash, cs3(c2, c3, c4)), co(nat2, caddc, nat1), nat3)
  s3len(c2, c3, c4)
  df-3()
  oveq1i(nat2, caddc, nat1, cfv(chash, c1))
  eqtr2i(nat2, cfv(chash, c1), cfv(chash, cs2(c5, c6)))
  fveq2i(chash, c1, cs2(c5, c6))
  s2len(c5, c6)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 2wlkdlem1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ (# ` c0)=((# ` c1)[+]1)
  ⊣ c0 = <" c2 . c3 . c4 ">
  ⊣ c1 = <" c5 . c6 ">
} = {
  eqtri((# ` c0), ((# ` c1)[+]1), (# ` <" c2 . c3 . c4 ">))
  fveq2i(chash, c0, <" c2 . c3 . c4 ">)
  eqtri((# ` <" c2 . c3 . c4 ">), ((# ` c1)[+]1), (2[+]1))
  eqtri((# ` <" c2 . c3 . c4 ">), (2[+]1), nat3)
  s3len(c2, c3, c4)
  df-3()
  oveq1i(nat2, caddc, nat1, (# ` c1))
  eqtr2i(nat2, (# ` c1), (# ` <" c5 . c6 ">))
  fveq2i(chash, c1, <" c5 . c6 ">)
  s2len(c5, c6)
}

  syl(w0, w3a(wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat0), c3), wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat1), c4), wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat2), c5)), w3a(wcel(c3, cfv(cvtx, c1)), wcel(c4, cfv(cvtx, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(cvtx, c1))))

blocks.name: umgr2adedgwlkon
blocks.content: In a multigraph, two adjacent edges form a walk between two vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 30-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm umgr2adedgwlkon(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(cwlkson, c2), c3), c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cedg, c2))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(ciedg, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cs2(c7, c8))
  -| wceq(c4, cs3(c1, c9, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cumgr))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(cpr(c1, c9), c5), wcel(cpr(c9, c3), c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c6, c7), cpr(c1, c9)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c6, c8), cpr(c9, c3)))
} = {
  2wlkond(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c9, c7, c8, cfv(cvtx, c2), c6, w0)
  simprd(w0, w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c2)), wcel(c9, cfv(cvtx, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cvtx, c2))), wa(wne(c1, c9), wne(c9, c3)))
  simpld(w0, wa(wne(c1, c9), wne(c9, c3)), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c2)), wcel(c9, cfv(cvtx, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cvtx, c2))))
  syl(w0, wa(wa(wne(c1, c9), wne(c9, c3)), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c2)), wcel(c9, cfv(cvtx, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cvtx, c2)))), w3a(wcel(c2, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c9), c5), wcel(cpr(c9, c3), c5)))
  sylanbrc(w0, w3a(wcel(c2, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c9), c5), wcel(cpr(c9, c3), c5)), wcel(c2, cumgr), wa(wcel(cpr(c1, c9), c5), wcel(cpr(c9, c3), c5)))
  3anass(wcel(c2, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c9), c5), wcel(cpr(c9, c3), c5))
  umgr2adedgwlklem(c2, c1, c9, c5, c3)
  jca(w0, wss(cpr(c1, c9), cfv(c6, c7)), wss(cpr(c9, c3), cfv(c6, c8)))
  syl5sseqr(cpr(c1, c9), cfv(c6, c7), cpr(c1, c9), w0)
  ssid(cpr(c1, c9))
  syl5sseqr(cpr(c9, c3), cfv(c6, c8), cpr(c9, c3), w0)
  ssid(cpr(c9, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm umgr2adedgwlkon(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[(c1[(WalksOn ` c2)]c3)]c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(Edg ` c2)
  ⊣ c6 =(iEdg ` c2)
  ⊣ c0 = <" c7 . c8 ">
  ⊣ c4 = <" c1 . c9 . c3 ">
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ UMGraph)
  ⊣ (w0 →({ c1, c9 } ∈ c5 ∧ { c9, c3 } ∈ c5))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c6 ` c7)= { c1, c9 })
  ⊣ (w0 →(c6 ` c8)= { c9, c3 })
} = {
  2wlkond(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c9, c7, c8, (Vtx ` c2), c6, w0)
  simprd(w0, (c1 ∈(Vtx ` c2)∧ c9 ∈(Vtx ` c2)∧ c3 ∈(Vtx ` c2)), (c1 ≠ c9 ∧ c9 ≠ c3))
  simpld(w0, (c1 ≠ c9 ∧ c9 ≠ c3), (c1 ∈(Vtx ` c2)∧ c9 ∈(Vtx ` c2)∧ c3 ∈(Vtx ` c2)))
  syl(w0, ((c1 ≠ c9 ∧ c9 ≠ c3)∧(c1 ∈(Vtx ` c2)∧ c9 ∈(Vtx ` c2)∧ c3 ∈(Vtx ` c2))), (c2 ∈ UMGraph ∧ { c1, c9 } ∈ c5 ∧ { c9, c3 } ∈ c5))
  sylanbrc(w0, (c2 ∈ UMGraph ∧ { c1, c9 } ∈ c5 ∧ { c9, c3 } ∈ c5), c2 ∈ UMGraph, ({ c1, c9 } ∈ c5 ∧ { c9, c3 } ∈ c5))
  3anass(c2 ∈ UMGraph, { c1, c9 } ∈ c5, { c9, c3 } ∈ c5)
  umgr2adedgwlklem(c2, c1, c9, c5, c3)
  jca(w0, { c1, c9 } ⊆(c6 ` c7), { c9, c3 } ⊆(c6 ` c8))
  syl5sseqr({ c1, c9 }, (c6 ` c7), { c1, c9 }, w0)
  ssid({ c1, c9 })
  syl5sseqr({ c9, c3 }, (c6 ` c8), { c9, c3 }, w0)
  ssid({ c9, c3 })
  eqid((Vtx ` c2))
}

thm umgr2adedgwlkonALT(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {

blocks.name: umgr2adedgspth
blocks.content: In a multigraph, two adjacent edges with different endvertices form a simple path of length 2. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 29-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm umgr2adedgspth(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cspths, c1), c2))

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ciedg, c1))

} = {

  sylanbrc(w0, w3a(wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c7, c8), c3), wcel(cpr(c8, c9), c3)), wcel(c1, cumgr), wa(wcel(cpr(c7, c8), c3), wcel(cpr(c8, c9), c3)))
  3anass(wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c7, c8), c3), wcel(cpr(c8, c9), c3))

  jca(w0, wss(cpr(c7, c8), cfv(c4, c5)), wss(cpr(c8, c9), cfv(c4, c6)))
  syl5sseqr(cpr(c7, c8), cfv(c4, c5), cpr(c7, c8), w0)
  ssid(cpr(c7, c8))
  syl5sseqr(cpr(c8, c9), cfv(c4, c6), cpr(c8, c9), w0)
  ssid(cpr(c8, c9))
  pm2.61d1(w0, wne(c5, c6), wceq(c5, c6))
  syld(w0, wceq(c5, c6), wne(c5, c6), wceq(cpr(c8, c9), cpr(c7, c8)))
  sylc(w0, wi(wceq(c5, c6), wceq(cpr(c8, c9), cpr(c7, c8))), wceq(cfv(c4, c5), cpr(c7, c8)), wceq(cfv(c4, c6), cpr(c8, c9)))
  com13(wceq(cfv(c4, c5), cpr(c7, c8)), wceq(cfv(c4, c6), cpr(c8, c9)), wceq(c5, c6), wceq(cpr(c8, c9), cpr(c7, c8)))
  syl6bi(wceq(c5, c6), wceq(cfv(c4, c6), cpr(c8, c9)), wi(wceq(cfv(c4, c5), cpr(c7, c8)), wceq(cpr(c8, c9), cpr(c7, c8))), wceq(cfv(c4, c5), cpr(c8, c9)))
  eqeq1d(cfv(c4, c6), cpr(c8, c9), cfv(c4, c5), wceq(c5, c6))
  eqcoms(c5, c6, wceq(cfv(c4, c6), cfv(c4, c5)))
  fveq2(c6, c5, c4)
  ex(wceq(cfv(c4, c5), cpr(c8, c9)), wceq(cfv(c4, c5), cpr(c7, c8)), wceq(cpr(c8, c9), cpr(c7, c8)))
  eqtr2(cfv(c4, c5), cpr(c8, c9), cpr(c7, c8))

  eqeq2i(cpr(c7, c8), cpr(c8, c9), cpr(c9, c8))
  prcom(c8, c9)
  syl6ci(w0, wceq(cpr(c7, c8), cpr(c9, c8)), wne(c5, c6), wceq(c7, c9), wne(c7, c9))
  syl(w0, wi(wceq(cpr(c7, c8), cpr(c9, c8)), wceq(c7, c9)), wa(wcel(c7, cfv(cvtx, c1)), wcel(c9, cfv(cvtx, c1))))

  simprd(wa(wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c8, c9), c3)), wcel(c9, cfv(cvtx, c1)), wcel(c8, cfv(cvtx, c1)))

blocks.pretty:
thm umgr2adedgspth(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[(SPaths ` c1)]c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(Edg ` c1)
  ⊣ c4 =(iEdg ` c1)
  ⊣ c0 = <" c5 . c6 ">
  ⊣ c2 = <" c7 . c8 . c9 ">
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ UMGraph)
  ⊣ (w0 →({ c7, c8 } ∈ c3 ∧ { c8, c9 } ∈ c3))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c4 ` c5)= { c7, c8 })
  ⊣ (w0 →(c4 ` c6)= { c8, c9 })
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ≠ c9)
} = {
  2spthd(c0, c1, c2, c7, c8, c9, c5, c6, (Vtx ` c1), c4, w0)
  simprd(w0, (c7 ∈(Vtx ` c1)∧ c8 ∈(Vtx ` c1)∧ c9 ∈(Vtx ` c1)), (c7 ≠ c8 ∧ c8 ≠ c9))
  simpld(w0, (c7 ≠ c8 ∧ c8 ≠ c9), (c7 ∈(Vtx ` c1)∧ c8 ∈(Vtx ` c1)∧ c9 ∈(Vtx ` c1)))
  syl(w0, ((c7 ≠ c8 ∧ c8 ≠ c9)∧(c7 ∈(Vtx ` c1)∧ c8 ∈(Vtx ` c1)∧ c9 ∈(Vtx ` c1))), (c1 ∈ UMGraph ∧ { c7, c8 } ∈ c3 ∧ { c8, c9 } ∈ c3))
  sylanbrc(w0, (c1 ∈ UMGraph ∧ { c7, c8 } ∈ c3 ∧ { c8, c9 } ∈ c3), c1 ∈ UMGraph, ({ c7, c8 } ∈ c3 ∧ { c8, c9 } ∈ c3))
  3anass(c1 ∈ UMGraph, { c7, c8 } ∈ c3, { c8, c9 } ∈ c3)
  umgr2adedgwlklem(c1, c7, c8, c3, c9)
  jca(w0, { c7, c8 } ⊆(c4 ` c5), { c8, c9 } ⊆(c4 ` c6))
  syl5sseqr({ c7, c8 }, (c4 ` c5), { c7, c8 }, w0)
  ssid({ c7, c8 })
  syl5sseqr({ c8, c9 }, (c4 ` c6), { c8, c9 }, w0)
  ssid({ c8, c9 })
  pm2.61d1(w0, c5 ≠ c6, c5 = c6)
  syld(w0, c5 = c6, c5 ≠ c6, { c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 })
  sylc(w0, (c5 = c6 → { c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 }), (c4 ` c5)= { c7, c8 }, (c4 ` c6)= { c8, c9 })
  com13((c4 ` c5)= { c7, c8 }, (c4 ` c6)= { c8, c9 }, c5 = c6, { c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 })
  syl6bi(c5 = c6, (c4 ` c6)= { c8, c9 }, ((c4 ` c5)= { c7, c8 } → { c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 }), (c4 ` c5)= { c8, c9 })
  eqeq1d((c4 ` c6), { c8, c9 }, (c4 ` c5), c5 = c6)
  eqcoms(c5, c6, (c4 ` c6)=(c4 ` c5))
  fveq2(c6, c5, c4)
  ex((c4 ` c5)= { c8, c9 }, (c4 ` c5)= { c7, c8 }, { c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 })
  eqtr2((c4 ` c5), { c8, c9 }, { c7, c8 })
  syl5bi(w0, { c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 }, c5 ≠ c6, { c7, c8 } = { c9, c8 })
  bitri({ c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 }, { c7, c8 } = { c9, c8 }, { c7, c8 } = { c8, c9 })
  eqcom({ c8, c9 }, { c7, c8 })
  eqeq2i({ c7, c8 }, { c8, c9 }, { c9, c8 })
  prcom(c8, c9)
  syl6ci(w0, { c7, c8 } = { c9, c8 }, c5 ≠ c6, c7 = c9, c7 ≠ c9)
  syl(w0, ({ c7, c8 } = { c9, c8 } → c7 = c9), (c7 ∈(Vtx ` c1)∧ c9 ∈(Vtx ` c1)))
  sylc(w0, (c7 ∈(Vtx ` c1)∧ c9 ∈(Vtx ` c1)), c1 ∈ UMGraph, ({ c7, c8 } ∈ c3 ∧ { c8, c9 } ∈ c3))
  anim12d(c1 ∈ UMGraph, { c7, c8 } ∈ c3, { c8, c9 } ∈ c3, c7 ∈(Vtx ` c1), c9 ∈(Vtx ` c1))
  ex(c1 ∈ UMGraph, { c7, c8 } ∈ c3, c7 ∈(Vtx ` c1))
  simpld((c1 ∈ UMGraph ∧ { c7, c8 } ∈ c3), c7 ∈(Vtx ` c1), c8 ∈(Vtx ` c1))
  umgrpredgv(c1, c7, c8, c3, (Vtx ` c1))
  ex(c1 ∈ UMGraph, { c8, c9 } ∈ c3, c9 ∈(Vtx ` c1))
  simprd((c1 ∈ UMGraph ∧ { c8, c9 } ∈ c3), c9 ∈(Vtx ` c1), c8 ∈(Vtx ` c1))
  umgrpredgv(c1, c8, c9, c3, (Vtx ` c1))
  eqid((Vtx ` c1))
  preqr1g(c7, (Vtx ` c1), c9, (Vtx ` c1), c8)
  eqneqall(c7, c9, c5 ≠ c6)

blocks.name: umgr2wlk
blocks.content: In a multigraph, there is a walk of length 2 for each pair of adjacent edges. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 30-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm umgr2wlk(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3), wcel(cpr(c2, c4), c3)), wex(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cwlks, c0), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2), w3a(wceq(c1, cfv(cv(s1), nat0)), wceq(c2, cfv(cv(s1), nat1)), wceq(c4, cfv(cv(s1), nat2)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)

blocks.name: umgr2wlkon
blocks.content: For each pair of adjacent edges in a multigraph, there is a walk of length 2 between the not common vertices of the edges. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 30-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm umgr2wlkon(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3), wcel(cpr(c2, c4), c3)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), co(c1, cfv(cwlkson, c0), c4), cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

blocks.name: wwlks2onsym
blocks.content: There is a walk of length 2 from one vertex to another vertex iff there is a walk of length 2 from the other vertex to the first vertex. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm wwlks2onsym(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  syl6rbb(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wa(wcel(cpr(c1, c3), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(cpr(c3, c4), cfv(cedg, c0))), wcel(cs3(c4, c3, c1), co(c4, co(nat2, cwwlksnon, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(cpr(c4, c3), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(cpr(c3, c1), cfv(cedg, c0))))
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cumgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wb(wcel(cs3(c4, c3, c1), co(c4, co(nat2, cwwlksnon, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(cpr(c4, c3), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(cpr(c3, c1), cfv(cedg, c0)))), w3a(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3anrev(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))

  prcom(c3, c1)
}

blocks.name: 2wspdisj
blocks.content: All simple paths of length 2 from a fixed vertex to another vertex are disjunct. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Mar-2018.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2wspdisj(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wdisj(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c1)), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mptru(wdisj(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c1)), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0))))
  disjord(s0, hs1, hs0, cdif(c0, csn(c1)), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0)), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(hs1)), wtru)
  oveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs1), c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2))
  3adant1(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  simprd(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c1, c1))
  wspthneq1eq2(cv(hs0), c1, nat2, c2, cv(s0), c1, cv(hs1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c0, csn(c1))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(hs1))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.cwwspthsnon.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(cdif(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(hs1)))
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
}
